Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Armitage/Richmond
ShortDescription: Eastbound  #73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Humbolt, North Ave, California and Armitage due to street blockage near Armitage/Richmond

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Humbolt, North Ave, California and Armitage due to street blockage near Armitage/Richmond

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
